name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

key_work.title: True History of the Kelly Gang
key_work.creator_credit: Alice Babidge, Brad Feinstein, Hal Vogel and Liz Watts
key_work.brief_description: True History of the Kelly Gang is a 2019 British-Australian biographical western film based on the exploits of Australia’s famous outlaw, Ned Kelly. It’s directed by Justin Kurzel, from a screenplay by Shaun Grant, based upon the 2000 novel of the same name by Peter Carey.

constellations_primary.name: The Australian industry
constellations_primary.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge.

constellations_primary.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_primary.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

constellations_other.name: Pink, Pose, punk, Pilgrim
constellations_other.description: Alice Babidge's costume design for True History of the Kelly Gang sees the iconic foursome and their accomplices in dresses, a gender-expansive stance that connects to other rebellious outlooks on the world.

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

start.title: Spoor
start.creator_credit: Janusz Wąchała, Krzysztof Zanussi, Agora Films, Eurimages and PISF
start.headline_credit: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Poland, Slovakia and Sweden, 2017
start.brief_description: A story about Janina Duszejko, an elderly woman, who lives alone in the Klodzko Valley where a series of mysterious crimes are committed. Duszejko is convinced that she knows who (or what) is the murderer, but nobody believes her.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

end.title: Treme
end.brief_description: Tremé takes its name from a neighborhood of New Orleans and portrays life in the aftermath of the 2005 hurricane. Beginning three months after Hurricane Katrina, the residents of New Orleans, including musicians, chefs, Mardi Gras Indians, and other New Orleanians struggle to rebuild their lives, their homes and their unique culture.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: Spoor follows the mysterious deaths of several hunters and the elderly woman who knows why. Holland wrote and directed the film, which won the Golden Bear at the Berlin International Film Festival. A HBO veteran, she also helmed several episodes of Treme.

start.title: Treme
start.brief_description: Tremé takes its name from a neighborhood of New Orleans and portrays life in the aftermath of the 2005 hurricane. Beginning three months after Hurricane Katrina, the residents of New Orleans, including musicians, chefs, Mardi Gras Indians, and other New Orleanians struggle to rebuild their lives, their homes and their unique culture.

end.title: Spice World
end.creator_credit: Barnaby Thompson, Bob Spiers, Mark L. Rosen, Uri Fruchtmann and Jamie Curtis
end.brief_description: Zany adventure that follows The Spice Girls and their entourage (mostly fictional characters) - manager Clifford, his assistant Deborah, and filmmaker Piers (who is trying to shoot a documentary on “the real Spice Girls”).

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: The heavily music orientated series Treme charted the lives of New Orleans residents post-Hurricane Katrina. The songs of Elvis Costello featured heavily in the show, with the singer/songwriter also appearing as himself in - of all things - Spiceworld: The Movie.

end.title: Snowtown
end.creator_credit: Alice Babidge, Anna McLeish and Sarah Shaw
end.brief_description: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother’s new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: In True History Of The Kelly Gang, Alice Babidge brought the outlaws to life with her period costumes. The film was directed by Australian writer/director Justin Kurzel, who she also collaborated with on Snowtown.

start.title: Snowtown

end.title: Assassin's Creed
end.creator_credit: Arnon Milchan, Conor McCaughan, Frank Marshall, Gerard Guillemot, Jean-Julien Baronnet, Michael Fassbender and Patrick Crowley
end.headline_credit: France, Hong Kong, Malta, Taiwan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016

video_links.name: Assassin’s Creed | Official Trailer 2 [HD] | 20th Century FOX
Assassin’s Creed | Final Trailer [HD] | 20th Century FOX
Assassin’s Creed | Official Trailer [HD] | 20th Century FOX

end.brief_description: Through unlocked genetic memories that allow him to relive the adventures of his ancestor in 15th century Spain, Callum Lynch discovers he’s a descendant of the secret ‘Assassins’ society. After gaining incredible knowledge and skills, he is now poised to take on the oppressive Knights Templar in the present day.

constellations_other.name: The Australian industry
constellations_other.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: Following the true story of the ‘bodies in the barrels’ murders, Snowtown was Kurzel’s breakout film. He went on to direct the big-budget Assassin’s Creed, based on the popular video games of the same name.

start.title: Assassin's Creed

end.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag

video_links.name: True Golden Age of Pirates Trailer
A Pirate Trained By Assassins Trailer

end.brief_description: Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag begins in 1715, when pirates established a lawless republic in the Caribbean and ruled the land and seas. These outlaws paralyzed navies, halted international trade, and plundered vast fortunes. They threatened the power structures that ruled Europe, inspired the imaginations of millions, and left a legacy that still endures.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: Considered one of the best video game to movie adaptations, Assassin’s Creed continued more than a decade’s worth of world-building that started with the games and carried on with novels, short films, comic books, boardgames and sequels like Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag.

start.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag

end.title: Black Sails
end.brief_description: The pirate adventures of Captain Flint and his men twenty years prior to Robert Louis Stevenson’s classic Treasure Island.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag was the sixth game in Ubisoft’s hugely popular gaming franchise and featured real-life pirate Anne Bonny as a character. She also appeared in television series Black Sails.

start.title: Black Sails
start.brief_description: The pirate adventures of Captain Flint and his men twenty years prior to Robert Louis Stevenson’s classic Treasure Island.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

end.title: The Wire
end.creator_credit: Ed Burns, Eric Overmyer and George Pelecanos
end.brief_description: Told from the points of view of both the Baltimore homicide and narcotics detectives and their targets, the series captures a universe in which the national war on drugs has become a permanent, self-sustaining bureaucracy, and distinctions between good and evil are routinely obliterated.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: Clara Paget played a dramatised version of Anne Bonny in Black Sails, who was arguably history’s most famous female pirate. German director Uta Briesewitz was the only woman to direct an episode of the TV series. She got her start in the business as director of photography on The Wire.

start.title: The Wire
start.creator_credit: Ed Burns, Eric Overmyer and George Pelecanos
start.brief_description: Told from the points of view of both the Baltimore homicide and narcotics detectives and their targets, the series captures a universe in which the national war on drugs has become a permanent, self-sustaining bureaucracy, and distinctions between good and evil are routinely obliterated.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

links.description: One of the greatest television shows of all time, The Wire took a multifaceted look at crime in Baltimore. Oscar-nominated filmmaker Agnieszka Holland directed pivotal episodes across three seasons as well as the Polish feature Spoor.
